column8:
This t-shirt design is of the Tube, the London underground train network.

If you have ever used the Tube, you will no doubt have entered into a love/hate relationship with it.

Love the convenience, speed and ease of use. Hate the crowds, the smog & slippery hand rails that often leave you wondering how & why they got like that!
